div.h3: Welcome to the Northern Cambria School District

div.div:
Click here for a Counselor Appointment Request
Updates:
4/20/20: Due to the Covid-19 pandemic and school closure, we will be live streaming the Board Meeting of the Northern Cambria School District on 4/21/2020 at 6pm.
In advance of the Board Meeting we are posting the public agenda.
Click here to view the agenda.
To join the meeting when it goes live, click the link below:
4/21/2020 6pm Meeting Live On Youtube
3/27/20
We have updated our Parent resources page with additional information regarding Google Classroom.
For any questions please call 814 948 6800 for the High School or 814 948 5880 for the Elementary Middle School.
3/31/20 Update from Bob Rocco
3/25/20 NCSD REMOTE LEARNING OUTLINE <-CLICK HERE
3/18/20: School Meals Program <-Click Here, Beginning Monday 3/23
3/16/20 The Northern Cambria School Board Meeting Scheduled for Tuesday March 17th has been cancelled.
3/13/20 The Northern Cambria School District will be closed for 10 business days starting Monday March 16th per the Governor's instruction.

div.p:
Welcome to the home of the Northern Cambria Colts! It features the latest web and eLearning platform to provide students, parents, and teachers with the best tools for success. Please come back regularly for news and updates.
Mission Statement:
It is the mission of the Northern Cambria School District to provide a quality educational environment which supports independent, critical & creative thinking, promotes ethical & productive, responsible behavior, and encourages citizens in the life-long pursuit of excellence for both today's and tomorrow's challenges.

span.style: font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Roboto, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(20, 23, 26);

p.span: The SATs scheduled for Saturday, March 14, 2020, at the Northern Cambria High School have been cancelled. Please visit the college board website for any updates.

span.style: font-family: sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
font-size: 16px;

font-size: 23px;

div.div: Our school utilizes the SchoolMessenger system to deliver text messages, straight to your mobile phone with important information about events, school closings, safety alerts and more.
